title: Donut Be Easy
description: "I'm gone!" That's all my now ex-wife said as she packed her stuff and stormed out of our house on my fortieth birthday. It was a total kick in the teeth. Right? I thought my life was completely over before it could really get started. Turns out gone wasn't a bad thing. Skye did me a favor. She made it possible for me to find my true calling in life - donuts. That cute little pastry chef was just the sprinkles on top.
author: Kristen Hope Mazzola
